UNION PLACE: INVITING APARTMENTS IN FRANKLIN, MA
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1000 Sq.
Ft.
Union Place is an inviting, pet-friendly apartment community in Franklin, MA, ideally located between Boston, MA and Providence, RI.
We offer 1-bedroom and 2-bedroom apartment homes for rent featuring multiple finish packages.
Select interior finishes include stainless steel appliances, wood plank flooring, and granite countertops.
Plus, all units include in-home washers and dryers and ample natural light.
Outside your home, enjoy our heated swimming pool, full-body fitness center, fully-enclosed dog park, and outdoor kitchen and grilling stations.
Our commuter-friendly location features proximity to the MBTA commuter rail, I-495, Route 1, and I-95.
Located on Independence Way, we are close to historic downtown Franklin, as well as nearby grocers, shops, and eateries.
We are currently offering self-guided tours.
Office Hours:
Monday-Friday: 10:00AM-5:30PM
Saturday: 10:30AM-4:30PM
